comment: Big fan of this whiskey, especially chilled. A nose with honey and citrus. Light taste that is sweet and smooth. I've never had a whiskey from Georgia but I am a fan of this one. Great bottle too! Nice small batch whiskey.
Its straight forward bourbon! I love when distillers just make moonshine and age it in barrells! Good stuff
Very sweet front taste. Not too long. Easy drinker.
It’s a bit on the sweeter side. More rye maybe? Good bourbon. Would buy again.
Smoother than expected.  Spicy taste and finish with very little bite.
Maple smell. Spicy with an oaky finish.
Not bad! There's a lasting burn but the flavor is pretty good. For a reasonable cheap "bourbon" it's a respectable choice

Stronger than your average bear. The best part is the heat that last 4 seconds longer than most giving all the flavors time to "cook". Exhale through the nose with your mouth slightly open and wow. I'm still picking out individual flavors. It's growing on me to be a top ten. Well done for a small distillery.
Not great. I'd use it for cocktails. Had it in Folly Beach while on vacation with Josh and Natascha
